snippet: Lawmakers and others say the government news agency is floundering at the very moment when America needs to counter sophisticated propaganda machines.
abstract: Resignation of Voice of America director David Ensor is latest sign of turmoil at the government news agency, which is charged with presenting America's viewpoint to the world; policy experts warn organization is floundering at the exact moment when America needs to counter sophisticated propaganda from countries like China and Russia and groups like the Islamic State.
lead_paragraph: Lawmakers and others say the government news agency is floundering at the very moment when America needs to counter sophisticated propaganda machines.

headline.main: Turmoil at Voice of America Is Seen as Hurting U.S. Ability to Counter Propaganda
headline.print_headline: Turmoil at Voice of America Is Seen as Hurting U.S. Ability to Counter Propaganda

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
